article:
'CRC Industries' is a manufacturer and distributor of industrial chemicals for
maintenance and repair of marine, electrical, industrial, automotive and
aviation equipment.

CRC is headquartered in Warminster, Pennsylvania, and markets products through
subsidiaries in the United States, Australia, Belgium, and New Zealand. [http://www.berwind.com/CRC.htm CRC Industries] on Berwind Group
website, retrieved 2011-04-04

The company was founded in 1958 by Charles J. Webb II and Norman Larsen as
Corrosion Reaction Consultants, Inc to produce an anti-corrosion and lubricant
spray, '5â56'. [http://www.crcindustries.com/auto/content/crcstory.aspx CRC
Story] on CRC Industries website, retrieved 2011-04-04 The company has
been owned by Berwind Group since 1981.

Their facilities in Warminster include a private railroad spur, served by the
New Hope and Ivyland Railroad. Traffic on the spur constitutes a sizable
portion of the railroad's freight traffic; CRC Industries is their largest
freight customer.
categories: Chemical companies of the United States
